projects.name: AI Clipper and Caption Generator
projects.description: An AI-powered video editor that transforms long videos into shareable social media clips. Leverages OpenAI Whisper and Google Gemini to automatically detect highlights, transcribe speech, and generate engaging captions—saving hours of manual editing work.

projects.name: Web Based Accounting System
projects.description: A tool to manage personal finances — track transactions, monitor balances, and manage accounts securely.

projects.name: Blogging Platform
projects.description: A web application built for users to create, edit, and publish blog posts. Includes user authentication, rich-text editing, and a clean, responsive interface for reading and managing content.

projects.name: Taskly-Todo App
projects.description: A full-stack todo list application built with Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and EJS templates.

projects.name: Stock Picker
projects.description: A web app that displays real-time stock data to help users explore and track market trends easily.

projects.name: Movie Discovery App
projects.description: A modern React movie search app with glassmorphism design, real-time search, and trending movies carousel.

projects.name: Simon Game
projects.description: A modern implementation of the classic Simon electronic memory game. Test and improve your memory by repeating increasingly complex sequences of colors and sounds.
